snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday’s selections include a profile of Dennis Crowley, one of Foursquare’s founders, and a breakdown of changes coming to Apple’s newest mobile operating system.
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday’s selections include a profile of Dennis Crowley, one of Foursquare’s founders, and a breakdown of changes coming to Apple’s newest mobile operating system.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: iOS Features and Will Foursquare's Crowley Find His Way?
